Motivation: Anxiety serves no purpose other than stealing today’s joy.
Worrying doesn’t empty tomorrow of its sorrows; it empties today of its strengths.
Anxiety is like a rocking chair. It gives you something to do but it doesn’t get you very far.
Anxiety is experiencing failure and defeat in advance. Don’t waste your time.
Don’t believe every worried thought you have. Worried thoughts are notoriously inaccurate.
No amount of regret can change the past. No amount of anxiety can change the future.
Our anxiety does not come from thinking about the future, but from wanting to control it.
Stop trying to calm the storm. Calm yourself. The storm will pass
You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway
Your anxiety is lying to you. You are loved and you are going to be okay.
Anxiety is the fear of more fear.
When you’re feeling anxious remember that you’re still you. You are not your anxiety
The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another
Stress does more than make you sick it destroys your peace, hope, and dreams.
Most things we worry about never happen.
You cannot always control what goes on outside, but you can always control what goes on inside
If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment, live in the breath.
Smile, breathe, and go slowly
Don’t be pushed by your problems, be led by your dreams
What else does anxiety about the future bring you but sorrow upon sorrow.
If it won’t matter in a year from now, or even a month, it shouldn’t matter now
There is nothing in this world that can trouble you as much as your own thoughts.
You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them
You can do anything, but not everything.
It’s not the stress that kills us, it’s our reaction to it
Note to self: Everything is going to be okay.
If you treat every situation as a life and death matter, you’ll die a lot of times
You’re only here for a short visit. Don’t hurry, don’t worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
Do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself.
Learning to ignore things is one of the great paths to inner peace
Your mind will believe everything you tell it. Feed it love, truth, faith, and hope
Remember, you survived 100% of your worst days
The day you stop worrying will be the first day of your new life; anxiety takes you in circles, trust in yourself and become free.
Worry is a down payment on a problem you may never have
Stop overthinking. If it’s not meant to be, it’s not meant to be
Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations
Close your eyes. Clear your heart. Let it go
Worrying is like walking around with an umbrella waiting for it to rain
Fear and anxiety many times indicates that we are moving in a positive direction, out of the same confines of our comfort zone, and in the direction of our true purpose.
You don’t have to control your thoughts, you just have to stop letting them control you
There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will.
Trust yourself. You’ve survived a lot, and you’ll survive whatever is coming
Anxiety is nothing but repeatedly experiencing failure in advance. What a waste
Rule number one is don’t sweat the small stuff. Rule number two, it’s all small stuff
If it’s not going to matter in five years, don’t spend five minutes being upset about it.
You can’t calm the storm. So stop trying. What you can do is calm yourself. The storm will pass
Breathe. You’re going to be okay. You’ve gotten through so many things in your life. You’ve got this
Flowers grow back even after the harshest winters. You will too.
Fear thrives in a place of inaction. Overcome your anxiety by taking one small step forward
You don’t have to control your thoughts, you just have to let them stop controlling you
Remember how far you’ve come, not just how far you have to go. You are not where you want to be, but neither are you where you used to be
You are going to overcome what you’re currently struggling with. Be patient. You’re going to be okay
Learning to ignore things is one of the great paths to inner peace
Whatever happens around you, don’t take it personally…Nothing other people do is because of you. It is because of themselves
You don’t always need a plan. Sometimes you just need to breathe, trust, let go, and see what happens
Your anxiety is lying to you. You are loved and are going to be okay.
You’re a fighter. Look at everything you’ve overcome. Don’t give up now
Choose to be optimistic. It feels better
Close your eyes and imagine the best version of you possible, that’s who you really are. Let go of any part of you that doesn’t believe it
Feel the feeling but don’t become the emotion. Witness it. Allow it. Release it
You can’t go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending
When thinking about the future, remember this: no amount of guilt can change the past and no amount of anxiety can change the future.
Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
Don’t forget that you’re human. It’s okay if you have a meltdown. Just don’t unpack and live there. Cry it out. Then refocus on where your headed
Every time you are tempted to react in the same old way, ask if you want to be a prisoner of the past or a pioneer of the future
You don’t have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you
Nothing diminishes anxiety faster than action.

If you sing off-key, get beat by the competition, have your heart shattered, get fired…it’s not going to kill you. Ask anyone who’s been through it

You can’t always control what goes on outside. But you can always control what goes on inside

It’s OKAY to be scared. Being scared means you’re about to do something really, really brave

Hey you, keep living. It won’t always be this overwhelming

If you treat every situation as a life and death matter, you’ll die a lot of times.
Every tomorrow has two handles. We can take hold of it with the handle of anxiety or the handle of faith
Rule number one is, don’t sweat the small stuff. Rule number two is, it’s all small stuff.

All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
When you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.

Take chances, make mistakes. That’s how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave
If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude
n order to move on, you must understand why you felt what you did and why you no longer need to feel it

When I let go of what I am, I become what I want to be
Worrying is like a rocking chair, it gives you something to do, but it gets you nowhere

No amount of anxiety can change the future. No amount of regret can change the past

Don’t worry about achieving. Don’t worry about perfection. Just be there each moment as best you can

Anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strength

Surrender to what is, let go of what was, and have faith in what will be.
Whatever happens to you belongs to you. Make it yours. Feed it to yourself even if it feels impossible to swallow. Let it nurture you because it will

Nothing is permanent in this wicked world—not even our troubles
For us, there is only the trying. The rest is not our business

Life does not have to be perfect to be wonderful
